problem_names: lemma [code]: "power_int (int_of_integer a) (int_of_integer b) = int_of_integer (power_integer a b)"
translations:
proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. log2 (int_of_integer a) = int_of_integer (log2_integer a)

definition power_int::"int \<Rightarrow> int \<Rightarrow> int"
  where "power_int a b = a ^ (nat b)"

lift_definition power_integer :: "integer \<Rightarrow> integer \<Rightarrow> integer"
  is "power_int :: int \<Rightarrow> int \<Rightarrow> int"
lemma [code]: "power_int (int_of_integer a) (int_of_integer b) = int_of_integer (power_integer a b)"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. Optimize_Integer.power_int (int_of_integer a) (int_of_integer b) =
    int_of_integer (power_integer a b)
